thread.title: BRIEF-Teranga Gold Posts Qtrly Earnings Per Share $0.03

title: BRIEF-Teranga Gold Posts Qtrly Earnings Per Share $0.03
text:
May 3, 2018 / 10:19 AM / Updated 3 minutes ago BRIEF-Teranga Gold Posts Qtrly Earnings Per Share $0.03 Reuters Staff
May 3 (Reuters) - Teranga Gold Corp:
* INCREASED PRODUCTION AND LOWER COSTS UNDERPIN TERANGA GOLD’S Q1 2018 STRONG OPERATING RESULTS * QTRLY GOLD PRODUCED 64,031 OZ, UP 13 PERCENT
* TERANGA GOLD - QTRLY GOLD SOLD 65,234 OZ, UP 14 PERCENT
* TERANGA GOLD - QTRLY REVENUE $86.2 MILLION, UP 23 PERCENT
* TERANGA GOLD - QTRLY EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.03
* TERANGA GOLD - QTRLY ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.10
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.12 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* TERANGA GOLD - OUTLOOK FOR SABODALA’S PRODUCTION IN 2018 IS 210,000-225,000 OUNCES OF GOLD Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
